Class WRasterClassic

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.utils.wysiwyg.WRaster
us.mn.state.dot.tms.utils.wysiwyg.WRasterClassic
public class WRasterClassic extends WRaster
WRasterClassic: WRaster child-class for color-classic graphics. Each value in the pixels array for this class contains a color-classic color number or one of the three generic DEFAULT_BG, DEFAULT_FG, or ERROR_PIXEL colors. (value range: -3..9)
Author:
John L. Stanley - SRF Consulting
